title: 4 Simple Steps to Find Creative Commons Videos on YouTube

steps.title: Open the YouTube mobile app or visit https://www.youtube.com.
steps.content: Open the YouTube mobile app or visit https://www.youtube.com . You can search for Creative Common videos on your computer, phone, or tablet.

steps.title: You'll need to enter some search terms to display Creative Commons videos.
steps.content: You'll need to enter some search terms to display Creative Commons videos. For example, if you want to find Creative Commons videos with dogs, you could search for dogs here. Initially, your results will include all videos that match your search terms, including those which aren't Creative Commons.

steps.title: The steps to filter search results are a little different depending on your device.
steps.content: The steps to filter search results are a little different depending on your device. On a computer, click FILTERS at the top-left corner of your search results. On an Android, iPhone, or iPad, tap the three dots at the top-right and select Search filters .

steps.title: Click or tap Creative Commons to display only Creative Commons videos.
steps.content: Click or tap Creative Commons to display only Creative Commons videos. Now you can use these videos in your own videos or projects without worrying about copyright violations. [1] X Research source
